metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0741 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Improper input validation in all versions of GitLab CE/EE using sendmail to send emails allowed an attacker to steal environment variables via specially crafted email addresses.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
